Token.Abstract: @brief Resizes the height of the receiver to fit its current content.

Parameter.Name: allowShrinking
Parameter.Abstract: If YES, the method always resizes the receiver's height to fit the current content.  If NO, and if the height required by the receiver's current content is smaller than the receiver's current height, the receiver's height is not resized.  This is used to avoid a changing height which could be annoying in many circumstances.

Token.Abstract: @brief Compares the left edge of the receiver with the left edge of a other view.

ReturnValue.Abstract: NSOrderedAscending if the other view's left edge is to the right of the receiver, etc.
